#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <stack>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n;
	string infix;
	string rpn;
	stack<char> ops;

	cin >> n;

	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
	{
		rpn.clear();

		cin >> infix;

		for (unsigned int j = 0; j < infix.size(); j++)
		{
			if (isalpha(infix[j]))
			{
				rpn = rpn + infix[j];
			}
			else if (infix[j] == ')')
			{
				rpn = rpn + ops.top();
				ops.pop();
			}
			else if (infix[j] != '(')
			{
				ops.push(infix[j]);
			}
		}

		cout << rpn << '\n';
	}
}
